instructions: Tap the Watch app on the iPhone Home screen. Scroll down and tap General . Scroll down to Enable Screenshots and move the toggle switch to the On/green position.
Open the Watch app on your iPhone. Scroll down and tap Sounds & Haptics . Scroll down and move the Cover to Mute toggle switch to the On/green position.

Swipe up on your Apple Watch display to show the control panel screen. Tap the iPhone icon to have your phone make a dinging noise. Press the phone icon several times as you listen for the sound the iPhone makes. The watch displays "Pinging iPhone" while the iPhone plays a sound.
